page.title: 13 Osborne House Visit (5)
page.content:
{The Queen's Lift The Queen's Lift was made solely for Queen Victoria because she was a liitle too old to use the stairs. The lift was operated by hand until about 1890 when it became machine operated.
{The Indian Corridor The Indian Corridor is full of Indian statues, pictures, vases and ornaments. It has lots of gifts and presents which were given to the Queen by rich Rajah's of India, because Queen Victoria was not only Queen of England but also Emporess of India.
Queen Victoria died in 1901 after being Queen for 56 years.
{Lisa Watts and Elizabeth Whittle {( 9 years of age )
